text: Nenapisikolliri; avanu (allahanu)ad janangada balika nim'mannu uttaradhikarigalagi madidanu hagu avanu nimage bhumiyalli neleyannu odagisidanu. Niviga adara bayalu pradesagalalli aramanegalannu nirmisuttiri mattu bettagalannu koredu nivasagalannu racisuttiri. Allahana koduge galannu smarisiri mattu bhumiyalli asantiyannu habbuvavaragi aleyabedi
